title: Where can I download previous year UPSC question paper? - Quora
tags: Union Public Service Commission of India

response.answer_text: If you’re anything like me, you’re probably also thinking - Ah! Let me get the papers first, then I will definitely do one paper per week in a full sitting! Hate to break it to you, but it never ends up happening that way. There’s always that roommate who barges in to get food, or guests decide to show up unannounced or nature calls. So unless you have an actual clock ticking which you can’t change at will, you would most likely be sidetracked. Hence, you are generally better off attempting the papers in a timed setting where you can’t hack the clock and the pressure is really on. You can download pdfs if that’s your style or attempt the UPSC Question Papers 2014 - 2017 online on Exambazaar for free. PS: It’s also an excellent excuse for avoid unannounced guests. :)

Hey, Go through these websites, 1.UPSC Previous Years Question Papers & Ans. UPSC Prelims Answer Key - 7th Aug 2016 - Now Available 8.UPSC Civil Services Exam Previous Year Question Papers (IAS/IPS) Hope this helps you.
